channel.title: Problem logging on [Shardes]~[CreativeScape]
channel.description:
It logs me, or any player off when you log in. When you make an account that isn't already created everything works, until you log off, and try to log on again.
An error message shows up on the runclient cmd. [code]Error: T2 - 97,126,126 - 2,0,0 - 103,72, urlstream[/code] I'm not posting this in client help because I believe this is something to do with the client not reading the server?

item.title: Problem logging on [Shardes]~[CreativeScape]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

It logs me, or any player off when you log in.
When you make an account that isn’t already created everything works, until you log off, and try to log on again.

An error message shows up on the runclient cmd.

Error: T2 - 97,126,126 - 2,0,0 - 103,72, urlstream
I’m not posting this in client help because I believe this is something to do with the client not reading the server?

Read full topic
